    • Constructor Detail

      • Drink

        public Drink(java.math.BigDecimal price,
     java.lang.String description,
     java.lang.String type)
        This is the constructor for the drink class. When this method is called, the three parameters of price, description and price must be entered.
        Parameters:
        price - This is the price of the item.
        description - This tells us whether it is a drink, side or pizza.
        type - This tells us what kind of drink it is.

        public java.lang.String getDrinkType()
        This method can be called to find out what kind of drink a certain drink is.
